title: Lewis & Clark National Historic Trail: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         Volunteers Bob Schipf and Jack Fisher working during the Bicentennial. NPS Photo  NPS Centennial The National Park Service is turning 100 years old in 2016! Partners Learn about our partnerships along the trail. Donate Find out how you can make a financial donation. Volunteer Opportunities at Lewis and Clark NHT. Work With Us Find job opportunities at Lewis and Clark NHT. Planning The planning process is how the public can express opinions in the management of a national park. Find out if any current opportunities exist to share your voice, or browse past planning documents. Support Your Park Learn about the ample opportunities to support the trail.
